评论详情: I absolutely love the red! Shirt is good quality.
The style is my favorite. Great fit. It’s comfortable and soft. I highly recommend this sweatshirt.  Also love the color for this time of year.

评论概述: Absolutely love this. Looks just like pictures
评论详情: Love this sweatshirt. The color is vibrant and the material is great quality.  Does run a bit big even though I like the oversized look.  going to exchange for a large  and may purchase another one in a different color.  I would rate this a warm sweatshirt the material is fairly thick.

The pink one I’m wearing in the photo was a gift and I immediately ordered two more in different colors because I love it so much. I normally wear a medium, but I sized up to a large because I like a roomier fit. I love the boho detailing on this sweatshirt, it reminds me of a free people shirt . Nice and lightweight,  just an all-around great sweatshirt to wear with leggings or jeans.

**Dokotoo Hoodies for Women Review**  ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5 stars)  I absolutely love the *Dokotoo Hoodies for Women*—it’s quickly become one of my go-to pieces for fall! The fit is wonderfully loose and comfy, giving me that cozy, relaxed vibe while still looking put together. The vibrant red color is stunning and adds the perfect pop to my wardrobe. I’ve received so many compliments every time I wear it! The v-neck and button-down details give it a stylish, trendy twist, making it easy to dress up or down. Another thing I appreciate is that the color hasn’t bled in the laundry, even after multiple washes—such a relief! The fabric is soft and warm enough for cooler days, but breathable enough for comfort. Whether I’m lounging at home or running errands, this hoodie has been the perfect addition to my fall collection. If you’re looking for a chic, comfy hoodie that stands out, this one is a must-have! Highly recommend!
Also, this top is cropped and ribbed. Didn't see that listed? Not a fan. Returning.
Super comfy and lightweight. Perfect length, and great to pair with a jacket or coat.  update: this shrank an entire size after washing in cold water and laying flat to dry.
Great quality and material. Very cute on!

Color is not at all the same….its has a shade of pink to it. Would return it because the picture is misleading bit I needed a sweater. So unfortunately keeping it. Ive ordered the black one previously and they are super comfortable.
This is a beautiful, well made, comfy, fun-to-wear hoody shirt. Love the fabric, the fit and the look!  I’m a large, ordered a large and it fits perfect!
Great design, nice material. Too large, suggest order 2 sizes down
I ordered grey and it came really light and white looking…white wasn’t even a color we could order. Material is nice but I don’t like white

评论概述: Not sure of the raw edges
评论详情: Purchased in brown & gray. Nice fabric, soft & comfy. Normally wear 2X, but ordered a 1X because I didn't want it to look too frumpy. Fit nicely. Love everything about it except for the raw edges. Just makes it look like it was put together inside out. Debating on returning.
I really like this shirt.  Fits slightly oversized.  Nice medium weight fabric.  Reminds me of a Free People top.
Love it it’s so comfy. It’s so easy to put on over a tank top and it’s great for Arizona weather and winter.. it’s super cute on.

评论概述: Salmon color is quite a bright orange
评论详情: I didn’t keep this top because the color was too vivid and orange for me. But I bought the Dockatoo waffle weave shirt and loved that. So the color with this one just not for me.

This item was sewn inside out. Raw edges on the outside of the shoulder seams. And on the button up neckline. Tried turning it inside out. Would have been right, but the buttons would be on the inside. Piece of junk.

This hoodie in lavender/purple is really comfy and cute with the Boho raw edge detail. But it is very roomy and long (on a shorter girl)! I usually wear a large and ordered that size. But I definitely could have gotten away with a medium in this one! And because I really don’t like to wear sweatshirts with bands across the bottom (and this one hangs too long and looks boxy on me), I will be cutting the band off for a raw edge hem and to be a little more flattering on me. For reference, I am 5‘5“ but short waisted. I also have shorter arms, so I will have to roll the sleeves up a couple of times. But honestly, it looks cute that way. Definitely a good value for the price!

Probably the best quality item on Amazon!  I was impressed by the detail.  Perfect for Houston "fall" weather.  Medium weight, easy to take off.  I would prefer an xs option but small works.  Glad i got this item.
I love the style and the thickness of the material it is quality fabric! I instantly ordered another one in a different color!!
I like the over sized/loose fit. Also the quirky inside out look. Unique
Cute top.  Soft material but shrank after washing
It's a little heavy. Other than that I love it 😀

评论概述: Not exactly what I hoped for
评论详情: I love the shirt, I just wish it was a little longer. I am 5'10" and have that problem sometimes. It is not a dealbreaker but just letting others know. Overall it is worth the money.
Cute hoodie. I like the frayed edges near the hood and buttons. Way bigger than expected. Ordered a Medium and it hangs on me. I'm 5'9" 145lbs
Super soft, cute and boxy. Looks best with sleeves rolled because wrists are wide.
Worst quality ever.  Has been returned.

The hood looked like it was sewn on to the shirt inside out as did the shoulders. I prefer the seams to be inside the garment. I don’t know if this was accidental or an attempt to look cool. Looked like I got it at the dollar store. I returned it.
I am very disappointed in the finishing workmanship of this garment. I am too embarrassed to wear it.  It looks like a child finished out this shirt.

评论概述: This is not green at all.
评论详情: Loved the top on the site and couldn’t wait to get it. What a total disappointment. There is nothing green about it. It looks beige, but definitely not green. Will be returning this item.
As ordered, on time
The arm holes are huge so they slide up your arm/don’t stay at your wrist. The color is pretty. The shirt is lightweight - not heavy like a sweatshirt.
So soft and comfy. I’m wearing it right now
Very cute. It's a good weight hoodie. It's going to be perfect for cold weather under a vest or coat for warmth. It washed up great. Fit is as expected. Would recommend.
I loved the color and the fit was perfect, I did size down as it is oversized.  All the Dokotoo products I have received are very comfortable and well made.

This sweatshirt is designer-inspired and absolutely fabulous! It's wrinkle-free, fits perfectly, and is super easy to just throw on and head out. I loved it so much that I ended up getting two! It runs true to size; I'm a small.
Very loose fitting. Warm.
Runs big, thinner  material than I expected.
I’m a size L. I ordered an XL and it gives the perfect amount of bagginess!
Did not care for the color. It was a bit too peachy,l
This sweater is not only cute but comfortable and good quality.
Fit is good. Very comfortable. Color is brighter than picture. Starting to pill on sleeves after a couple of washes.

I thought I was buying a burnt orange. It came in neon. Hopefully if I keep washing it the color will tone down. Doubt it though lol. Neon orange is not my thing. But the like the hoodies texture and fit
Great sweatshirt. Made well. I sized up for an even more oversized fit. Purchased the light orange. It’s more of a sherbert orange not at all like the photo. Keeping because I like the style.

评论概述: Good fit didn’t care for the color
评论详情: The fit was good I sized up for a more baggy look. The color was not as expected, it was a funny yellowish tan color. I was expecting a more Coco brown color. I ended up keeping it though.

I did like the soft fabric however the color is more like a bright orange sherbert color. Not what I was wanting. Also it is very oversized. Due to my petite size I am swimming in it. I should have downsized maybe 2 sizes.

评论概述: The sweater is put together with part of the fabric inside out.  It is totally ridiculous.
评论详情: No one could wear this the way it is put together. I can’t believe it passed any form of quality control. The color is good but I can’t imagine how it was sent out  This problem is beyond understanding…

评论概述: Cute and soft but not exactly as photo shows
评论详情: Super soft, but just a bit oversized glad I sized up to a large for comfort. The detail is not exactly as the primary photo, but after washing it did get a tiny bit of the frayed look and I pulled at the raw edges also to help. The bottom hem is what looks off to me but it is sooooo soft and comfy, I love it anyway.  It washed and dried normal and I did not notice shrinkage but I don’t dry on high temp, medium was good. The hood is large to wear (slouchy) but it looks nice draped on my back. I already bought another in pink! The buttons are real and a nice metallic- not plastic!  I am 5’6, 155, 34ddd hourglass, 39, 29, 39. Somewhat muscular build. Normally size 6 and 28 (7 juniors) in jeans.
Returned  It was sewn inside out. Hahah
The fabric is horrible almost unwashable.
Light weight, comfortable, nice color, washes up well. Travels well doesn’t wrinkle.
It’s amazing!!
I’m in love with this hoodie. It’s soft, roomy & washes up nicely. I’ll be getting more
Look just as pictures good quality looks great with short.
This hoodie is awesome!  I love Free People and this honestly reminds me of exactly that brand!  Soft, baggy and very chic!  Buying other colors!  A must have!
Cute and comfortable
Love this top. Cute with jean shorts. It is a little cropped which I don’t love but I just sized up one size.
Loose-fitting, comfortable, lightweight and great for layering.

评论概述: Love this so much I bought it twice!
评论详情: This is more of a true red than a burnt red but it’s still my favorite pull over. I love that it’s light weight and comfortable.  It’s easy to throw on with shorts or jeans. For is definitely oversized.

The style is cute but this is ABSOLUTELY NOT worth the money they are charging. This is NOT a sweatshirt, it’s a T-Shirt & the size is a joke! I like my sweatshirts big & loose so I ordered an XL…..It’s literally the size of a small! Don’t waste your time and money!
Great quality
Everything I hoped for
I liked the quality but not the actual shape or color. Color was not quite as shown and the fabric and cut were just somehow not the same. Like it wasn’t as boxy. It was more a large sweatshirt cut.
True to size good quality
Very cute and soft
In terms of quality - this garment is well made and exactly as described.  The style just isn't my jam - but that's not the manufacters fault. Would recommend.
Such a cute and casual top that you can dress up or down! I’m not a huge fan of the hood on this top and would go one size up for that more oversized look.
Love the color, fit and comfort!!!
Pull over smelled under arm someone else had wore it
I got a small because of the reviews. I'm normally a M/L. It fit oversized but perfect. Definitely size down 1 or 2 sizes. I will purchase again in another color. Very good quality also.
Used a very common household stain remover on this and it completely ruined it.

I absolutely loved the picture of the orange color but, when I got it, it was more light peach. No biggie really with that. Based on the reviews I ordered a small because I wanted more of a crop like top. When I opened it, I was shocked. It's sooo big...almost like a large. Not cropped, not fitted, not a small, not what I expected. The quality is awesome for sure but the size is a downfall. Sad to say but I'll be returning it for sure. Boooo!!
Super soft and comfy especially with my favorite denim. Definitely an item of choice when hanging out on the weekend or watching movies outside at the fire pit!
Nice sweatshirt that is a good material but a tad bit short
love this shirt! Perfect sizing, not too thick but not to thin!

评论概述: Buttons placed unevenly, different buttons than show in picture.
评论详情: Buttons are different than what is shown in the pictures (in the black sweatshirt.) Buttons are also placed unevenly - some farther apart than others. One button is off center. First 2 pictures are what I received. The last 2 are what is advertised.

This is a cute sweatshirt. However, it is short waisted, loose and pretty wide so it gives a boxy look to it. When I raise my arms my stomach shows and I’m not comfortable with that (maybe when I was younger lol).  I would have returned it but I had already washed it.

评论概述: So cute perfect for spring or late summer evenings
评论详情: Got this for a trip to Florida (February/March) it is perfect to throw on to watch sunset at night, or sit out by a fire! It’s light weight but sturdy and so comfy and cute. I ended up buying in 3 different colors.  I didn’t realize there is a hood, but that didn’t make me like or dislike this, I’m pretty neutral. It is definitely cropped but I sized up for an oversized look and so the crop is basically the length of a normal shirt on me.
I like the concept but I feel like the distressed seams were over done and I wish it was as long as it is wide

评论概述: Cute hoodie but not as soft and loose as I thought!
评论详情: I like the style but this hooded sweatshirt is not as “loose” as depicted in the description. It’s definitely more cropped than the model picture. I would not say it’s super soft. Semi soft. I’ve worn a few times with baggy jeans and with leggings. I do not regret buying it and maybe over time it will soften up a bit. If you want more baggy look, definitely size up! I ordered medium in “grey” but it for sure looks more green! For the money, I would likely not order this again but I am also not dissatisfied with the purchase.
Sleeves are shorter than picture on website. Also, once I washed it, the look and feel of the shirt totally changed.
I love the color? Love the look but the length was shorter then I wanted.
I love this pullover. Has a rugged look. You can dress it up or down
Great for everyday, but also you can throw a sweater over it and dress it up with some leggings. Super cute, soft and very comfortable.  True to size.
Love this with jeans. So cute, loose fitting and soft. Will buy in more colors!

I would definitely call this a hooded long sleeve shirt not a sweatshirt. The material is very thin. I love the color and true to the description. As for the fit if you like the more boxy fit this is your shirt. It is true to size. I am typically an xs, but got a small so it wouldn’t be so cropped.
Super cute but really oversized.  I had to return.
Love the color, nice soft shirt, comfortable, true to size
Perfect
Love this oversized and the raw hem! So cute get one now
Definitely suggest buying it!!
Just wish it had pockets
I love the style of this hoodie, its comfortable and an overall good bounce around sweatshirt but the fabric rather inferior so I cannot give 5 stars.

Only reason I'm giving a 4 out of 5 is because it's too short for my liking and I'm just 5 2. Otherwise it's perfect in comfort and go to.  I bought one for my daughter as well and that's her only complaint as well.

The sweatshirt looks nothing like the photo. The sweatshirt is thin and very cropped. I ordered the khaki color and the shirt that arrived is a very light peachy pink skin color. It is going right back.
I ordered one of the two oranges and while it is orange it is nothing like the picture. It’s more coral like rust which is what the model has on. Returning.
It was very short in length and is a thin material .

I looked at various colors of this shirt for a while before deciding to order the light blue. I went back and forth on sizing and opted for a small based on the measurements of the shirt, even though my recommended size was a medium. I love the feel/texture, the color is gorgeous and perfect for winter through to spring. The fabric is a great quality and washed well. I have a short torso and the shirt comes just over the top of my pants. As I plan to wear this dressed up to work, I will have to wear a bodysuit or cami underneath. The sleeves are the perfect length for me, which likely means they’re too short for others. For reference, I’m 5’2”, 117lbs, 32DDD, and wear either a small or medium top.
I love both tops! Comfortable, warm & cozy! Great look with jeans. ♥️
Used for daily general wear with jeans soft material
